Description:
Detects the creation of an ADS (Alternate Data Stream) that contains an executable by looking at a non-empty Imphash

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems), @0xrawsec
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Hidden Executable In NTFS Alternate Data Stream
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where (hash like '%imphash=%' and  not hash like '%imphash=00000000000000000000000000000000%')
